summary: This appears to be an employment information form for an employee named Amy, working for LSJE, LLC in St. Thomas, US Virgin Islands. The document contains personal and emergency contact information, indicating she was employed as a 'Mathtenat.ce' (likely a garbled version of 'Maintenance') and was married with a daughter.
